ValidationRule.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-007566
Once the Status has been set to "Opportunity", the Marketing Qualified Lead record cannot be modified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "Opportunity"), $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", $User.Username != "mservente@newmarketinc.com",$User.Username != "ghopkins@newmarketinc.com")
/* Gave Mark Servente temporary access to update some MQLs that have been turned to Opportunities */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot make changes to a Marketing Qualified Lead once the Status has been set to "Opportunity"
